title: Suitability of treated wastewater for irrigation and its impact on groundwater resources in arid coastal regions: Insights for water resources sustainability
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Mohammed Benaafi, Arya Pradipta, Bassam Tawabini, Ahmed M. Al-Areeq, Abdullah Bafaqeer, John D. Humphrey, Mazen K. Nazal, Isam H. Aljundi
